answers.author: Toby Cotter
answers.text:
We post the entire packet on the website. The public can see the same information as the elected officials. 
www.bullheadcity.com

author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text: I prepare narratives or memos for every agenda.  It provides detail and background on an issue, together with recommendations and supporting materials.  These are made available to the public as part of the agenda.  Is this common?  What do you include with your agenda packet?  Thanks.
title: MAKING BOARD NARRITIVES PUBLIC
